title: President Museveni Launches Digital Economy Strategy
description: The Ugandan government has launched a new digital strategy aimed at transforming the country's economy using ICT.

title: Kampala City Festival Returns After 3 Years
description: Thousands flocked to the streets of Kampala to celebrate culture, food, and music in the city's biggest festival.

title: Uganda's Tech Startups Receive $5M Investment
description: Several Ugandan startups in FinTech and AgriTech sectors have received funding from international investors.
